instance.name: boolean_expansion
instance.description: All instances from all genes in result

instance.name: portal_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups with hits in any species: the representative gene in result is from PlasmoDB if it exists, otherwise from TriTrypDB if it exists, otherwise from CryptoDB if it exists, otherwise from ToxoDB if it exists, otherwise from GiardiaDB if it exists, otherwise from TrichDB.

instance.name: tce_genes
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener esmeraldo-like results

instance.name: tcne_genes
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener non-esmeraldo-like results

instance.name: tcu_genes
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi results which were not designated "esmeraldo-like" or "non-esmeraldo-like"

instance.name: deprecated_genes
instance.description:
Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803 deprecated genes.
These are previously annotated genes that newer annotation has shown to have insufficient evidence.

instance.name: assemblage_a_genes
instance.description: Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803 (both deprecated and undeprecated) genes.

instance.name: toxo_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T. gondii genes, with hits in any strain (the representative gene is: ME49 if it exists, otherwise GT1 if it exists, otherwise VEG.

instance.name: crypto_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of Cryptosporidium ortholog groups with hits in any species: the representative gene result is: C. parvum if it exists, otherwise C. hominis if it exists, otherwise C. muris if it exists, otherwise C. parvum chromosome 6.

instance.name: tbr_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T.brucei genes (the representative gene is: T.brucei strain TREU927 if it exists, otherwise T.brucei strain 427 if it exists, otherwise T.brucei gambiense.

instance.name: tc_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T.cruzi genes (the representative gene is: T.cruzi esmeraldo if it exists, otherwise T.cruzi non-esmeraldo if it exists, otherwise T.cruzi unassigned.

instance.name: tritryp_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: T.brucei if it exists, otherwise L.braziliensis if it exists, otherwise L.infantum if it exists, otherwise L.major if it exists, otherwise T.cruzi.

instance.name: giard_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: Giardia Assemblage A if it exists, otherwise Assemblage B if it exists, otherwise Assemblage E if it exists.

instance.name: amoeb_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: E. dispar if it exists, otherwise E. histolytica if it exists, otherwise E. invadens if it exists.

instance.name: micro_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: E. cuniculi if it exists, otherwise E. intestinalis if it exists.

instance.name: piro_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: B. bovis if it exists, otherwise T. annulata if it exists, otherwise T. parva.

instance.name: plasmo_ortholog_groups
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: P.falciparum if it exists, otherwise P. vivax if it exists, otherwise P. yoelii if it exists, otherwise P. berghei if it exists, otherwise P. chabaudi if it exists, otherwise P. knowlesi.

instance.name: each_tg_instance
instance.description: Number of T.gondii genes in the result that have exactly one gene instance from each strain.

instance.name: gt1_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg GT1 results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: me49_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg ME49 results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: veg_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg VEG results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: rh_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg RH results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: all_min_gt1
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a GT1 result

instance.name: all_min_me49
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a ME49 result

instance.name: all_min_veg
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a VEG result

instance.name: gt1_min_me49
instance.description: Genes that have a GT1 result but not an ME49 result

instance.name: gt1_min_veg
instance.description: Genes that have a GT1 result but not a VEG result

instance.name: me49_min_gt1
instance.description: Genes that have an ME49 result but not a GT1 result

instance.name: me49_min_veg
instance.description: Genes that have an ME49 result but not a VEG result

instance.name: veg_min_gt1
instance.description: Genes that have a VEG result but not a GT1 result

instance.name: veg_min_me49
instance.description: Genes that have a VEG result but not an ME49 result

instance.name: gt1_int_me49
instance.description: Genes that have both GT1 and ME49 results

instance.name: gt1_int_veg
instance.description: Genes that have both GT1 and VEG results

instance.name: me49_int_veg
instance.description: Genes that have both ME49 and VEG results

columnAttribute.name: strand
columnAttribute.help: Strand defines the direction of the gene relative to the contig

columnAttribute.name: gene_type
columnAttribute.help: Gene Product Categories

columnAttribute.name: exon_count
columnAttribute.help: Total number of Exons

plugin.name: histogram
plugin.description: Display the histogram of the values of this attribute

columnAttribute.name: transcript_length
columnAttribute.help: Number of nucleotides which are transcribed

columnAttribute.name: cds_length
columnAttribute.help: Number of nucleotides which will encode the protein product (coding sequence)

columnAttribute.name: product
columnAttribute.help: Protein Product for this gene

plugin.name: wordCloud
plugin.description: Display the terms in the attribute as word clouds

columnAttribute.name: protein_length
columnAttribute.help: Number of amino acids for the protein

columnAttribute.name: tm_count
columnAttribute.help: Numer of transmembrane domains for the protein

columnAttribute.name: molecular_weight
columnAttribute.help: Molecular Weight of the protein in Daltons

columnAttribute.name: ec_numbers_string
columnAttribute.help: Enzyme Commission classification of enzymes based on the reactions they catalyze

columnAttribute.name: ortholog_number
columnAttribute.help: Number of Orthologs within this database

columnAttribute.name: paralog_number
columnAttribute.help: Number of Paralogs within this database

columnAttribute.name: orthomcl_name
columnAttribute.help: orthomcl.org identifier OR other identifier for a group of orthologs

columnAttribute.name: signalp_scores
columnAttribute.help: Neural Network and HMM Scores

columnAttribute.name: signalp_peptide
columnAttribute.help: Minimum NN Conclusion Score = 3 OR Minimum NN-D-Score = 0.5 OR Minimum HMM Signal Probability = 0.5

columnAttribute.help: Gene Ontology representation of gene and gene product attributes

columnAttribute.help: Gene Ontology representation of gene and gene product attributes

columnAttribute.help: Gene Ontology representation of gene and gene product attributes

textAttribute.name: organism
textAttribute.help: The biological sample used to sequence this genome

textAttribute.name: tree_applet_link
textAttribute.text: Consensus tree

textAttribute.name: 3strains
textAttribute.displayName: Expression Graph for the ME49 Gene Model
textAttribute.text:
Expression profiling of three archetypal T. gondii lineages
Tachyzoite cell cycle
Tachyzoites under Bradyzoite-inducing conditions (Pru and RH)
CO2-starvation Bradyzoite Inducing Conditions (Pru and VEG)
Normal-tachyzoite vs. Induced-bradyzoite - 3 Tgondii Strains
Tacyzoite to Bradyzoite Differentiation Time Series

table.name: ToxoStrainsMicroarrayPercentile
table.displayName: Three archetypal T. gondii lineages - Percentiles

table.name: TwoChannelDiffExpr
table.displayName: P.Berghei Differential Expression - DOZI KO vs. WT

table.name: PdbSimilarities
table.displayName: Similarities to Protein Data Bank (PDB) Chains

textAttribute.name: GBrowse
textAttribute.help: View this Gene in the Genome Browser
